level.heading: REIMBURSEMENT FOR OUT OF STATE FACILITIES (ยง 29-6516)

level.text: If a facility is located outside the District of Columbia (“District”), MAA shall reimburse the facility for care rendered to a District Medicaid recipient in accordance with the Medicaid reimbursement policy of the state in which the facility is located.
MAA shall notify each out-of-state facility, in writing, of its payment rate calculated in accordance with this section.
An out-of-state facility is not required to file cost reports with MAA.

Each out-of-state facility shall obtain written authorization from MAA prior to admission of a District Medicaid recipient in accordance with the requirements set forth in sections 905.3 and 905.4 of Title 29 DCMR.
